is “an amenity” he love.
So I’m working my ass off, trying to make you happy, updating you as I go and making it clear what’s happening, and now I’m some dick taking the
proper Moyer family’s stuff.
I could not have been more clear ahead of time, it is documented in OFW and agreed to, and none of it happened. It’s unfucking cool to make me a
dick on all those counts trying to please you.
Message 340 of 4024
Confirming you will pick up Adrian from school today at 1:15pm and drop off at 8:30pm
I discussed with Adrian regarding school options for sixth grade. He is comfortable with us exploring SAAS as an option especially if he does not need
to go through the application process again as he was previously admitted. If we go for seventh grade he will need to do that again and will be part of
late application process/waitlist.
Sent:01/10/2024 at 07:50 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/10/2024 at 10:09 AM)
Subject:Adrian
Message 341 of 4024
Reminder coding is at 3:30. His laptop is at the Kirkland house. I can put it outside front door for pick up.
Dylan will be picked up by Christina.
Sent:01/10/2024 at 11:39 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/10/2024 at 11:40 AM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
Message 342 of 4024
I need my computer in the guest room. If you would like I can take additional things as well. But I need that at a minimum now. I’ll be over before
lunch as I need to do some things by then. Please let me know an appropriate window that works for you. Thanks!
Sent:01/11/2024 at 10:30 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 10:39 AM)
Subject:My Computer
Message 343 of 4024
Do not come to the Kirkland house. I do not give you permission.
Wait for further communication from your lawyer.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 10:40 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 10:41 AM)
Subject:Re: My Computer

Message 344 of 4024
What? Why is that?
Sent:01/11/2024 at 10:41 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 11:02 AM)
Subject:Re: My Computer
Message 345 of 4024
I recognize your ask. I will wait to get more stuff.
Yesterday after our argument I backed off all communications. I made a simple request to get my computer today so I could to some resources I need
for an interview. I have no idea why you are mad now.
I am trying to work with you and thought we had a plan, but I can’t get my things and have no reliable way to get in touch with you. That makes it
hard.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 11:14 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 11:14 AM)
Subject:Re: My Computer
Message 346 of 4024
Can you please tell me what I did wrong?
I’m racking my brain
- I had AD home a couple minutes late
- I didn’t communicate at all yesterday
- The TV swap problem is not solved
- There may be move stuff still in the way
- You still be mad from our discussion Tues
- The microwave has not been replaced
- We have not settled on a mediation date
I really don’t know, Christine. I am happy to send an update or chat since we skipped running list this week, but nothing is so out of whack that we
can’t just set a date/time to resolve. Can we please work together on this? I am so tired of fighting with you!!!
Sent:01/11/2024 at 03:22 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 03:48 PM)
Subject:Re: My Computer
Message 347 of 4024
I know you guys don’t use it and it’s really coming down hard here. May I please come get it? My driveway has a steep hill and there is no street
parking. So if we get snow, I can’t clear it, and then I’m going to be stuck with no way to leave. Thanks!
Sent:01/11/2024 at 03:37 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 03:49 PM)
Subject:Snow Blower

Message 348 of 4024
Our lawyers are talking at 4pm tomorrow. You should get an update afterwards in regards to the issue.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 03:50 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 03:50 PM)
Subject:Re: My Computer
Message 349 of 4024
I am not comfortable with you coming to the Kirkland house or entering the property.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 03:51 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 03:51 PM)
Subject:Re: Snow Blower
Message 350 of 4024
What the heck??? Just tell me if I did something wrong. I am not doing anything I know of that should cause extra acrimony. I’m trying to cooperate
with you Christine!
Sent:01/11/2024 at 03:51 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 03:52 PM)
Subject:Re: My Computer
Message 351 of 4024
Can you please put it outside?
Sent:01/11/2024 at 03:52 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 03:53 PM)
Subject:Re: Snow Blower
Message 352 of 4024
I have never escalated anything with you. Ever. Even the parenting plan or the December freeze out from seeing the kids. As all of that drug on for
months. I always work with you. Always. Even when we are mad,
and I ask Lisa a question I tell her I don’t want to act because we give it a day and then we are more reasonable with each other. WTH have I done that
you can’t even tell me? Please just be transparent and let’s keep this on track for a peaceful conclusion.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 03:59 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 04:10 PM)
Subject:Re: My Computer

Message 353 of 4024
I NEVER enter the Kirkland house without your permission for any reason. And I won’t do that today.
I just need to get the snow blower so I am not trapped. Can you please put it in the driveway.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 04:05 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 04:10 PM)
Subject:Re: Snow Blower
Message 354 of 4024
Ok...
so if something happens to me. An emergency for example, you are knowingly and intentionally taking away the only way I can get medical aide.
I don’t understand that, especially if you don’t use it at all, and I have no need to enter our Kirkland home, but that seems like your final decision.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 04:41 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 05:08 PM)
Subject:Re: Snow Blower
Message 355 of 4024
Does not seem like you are responding. Is there any chance we can chat for a few minutes? I don’t want an already awful situation to get even worse.
We really worked well as a team this week. Then we fought Tuesday night due to miscommunication. So I stepped back for a day to give you space.
I heard what you said, I disagreed, but know now fighting will only lead to a shittier situation for both of us and as a result will then impact our kids.
Please just share what’s up. I’m happy to stay backed off like yesterday. I listen and do my best. But if you don’t tell me, I don’t know what to correct.
Please, let’s not repeat that pattern. It’s cost so much.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 06:06 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 08:52 AM)
Subject:Communication
Message 356 of 4024
Will you please respond?
Sent:01/12/2024 at 08:55 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 08:58 AM)
Subject:Re: Communication

Message 357 of 4024
Our lawyers are talking today at 4 then you will get an update I am sure.
I don’t control your behavior and I must act and respond accordingly. There are consequences to any actions you and I take. We need to own that.
Once you and your lawyer have had time to digest, I’m sure you will formulate a response.
I believe you likely know the issue but probably did not think through the consequences and fall out. Maybe you did and just did not care.
Regardless, we are in this situation that I did not create but must respond to.
Sent:01/12/2024 at 08:58 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 08:58 AM)
Subject:Re: Communication
Message 358 of 4024
What on god’s green earth are you talking about Christine? I am trying so hard to work with you. I want to be a good partner and coparent here. We
got the parenting plan in place. We finally have me on the east side. We are good to go once I have my stuff. Please don’t stop this! We are on the verge
of finally being in a position to not have anything to fight about. This is what we wanted. We don’t need to argue over anything anymore. Please help
me understand why we can’t do that?
Sent:01/12/2024 at 09:01 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 09:07 AM)
Subject:Re: Communication
Message 359 of 4024
I am not responsible for your actions and there is accountability and consequences to that. You can work out your response via your lawyers.
Don’t waste my time with your pretend lack of understanding what the issue is. I am over the manipulation and abuse.
I am working today and will not continue this. I will wait for response from your lawyers.
Sent:01/12/2024 at 09:11 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 09:11 AM)
Subject:Re: Communication
Message 360 of 4024
What are you talking about?
If you please share we can have an informed discussion. I am happy to speak to anything you think I have done to you. I want to course correct and
make this a civil and workable relationship. We will be stuck doing this for the rest of our lives in some form or another. Let’s don’t blow it all up.
Please don’t repeat July 5th.
Sent:01/12/2024 at 09:14 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 09:22 AM)
Subject:Re: Communication

Message 361 of 4024
We have a lot of stuff that I was hoping to discuss.
- Kids therapist parent meeting
- Next steps for Alki (past 20 days)
- Elsa’s wedding budget and plans
- What we are telling the kids now
- Firm up plans for holiday weekend
That’s just a list of examples. There are more for sure.
I’m eager to keep working with you to make progress.
Thanks!
Sent:01/12/2024 at 12:27 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 02:25 PM)
Subject:Are we just dead in the Water?
Message 362 of 4024
AD has both AAU and Rec at 6:00 tonight.
Should we coordinate on a kid related issue so we can jointly resolve a relevant parenting situation?
Sent:01/12/2024 at 02:17 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 02:25 PM)
Subject:Hoops Tonight

I planned to take Adrian to AAU tonight. He has a game Sunday night.
There is no rec league game this weekend.
Sent:01/12/2024 at 02:26 PM
From:Christine Moyer

Subject:Re: Hoops Tonight
Message 364 of 4024
Kids therapist I can respond to her.
Alki I understood you were sending the NTV
Elsa wedding, you said you did not want to be in the discussion. She still needs to align what she wants to do.
Kids... going to await your response after you discuss with lawyer and see your response. I did not create this situation but had to respond with only
option I had to protect me and kids.
Holiday weekend. This will change after you discuss with lawyer. Plan is to stay with me.
Sent:01/12/2024 at 02:30 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 02:32 PM)
Subject:Re: Are we just dead in the Water?

.
Message 365 of 4024
What the heck are you talking about?
You are blackmailing me with the kids for something you won’t even tell me about? How are the kids even involved in this?
Sent:01/12/2024 at 02:33 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 02:34 PM)
Subject:Re: Are we just dead in the Water?
Message 366 of 4024
Talk to your lawyer Robert. I am not going to debate it on this platform and hear either your denials or excuses. You know what you did and to say I’
m blackmailing you is disgusting given your actions.
Just noting you are acting like you have no idea of what I am talking about.
Sent:01/12/2024 at 02:37 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 02:41 PM)
Subject:Re: Are we just dead in the Water?
Message 367 of 4024
This is blackmail. You do it to me all the time.
You have a huge honesty problem we know.
I have zero idea what you are talking about.
You will stop at nothing to destroy our family.
It’s just like the July the 5th phone call to me.
Except I just don’t know about a new affair yet.
We are going to work together at some point.
You are just throwing more gas on the fire now/
Sent:01/12/2024 at 02:46 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 03:39 PM)
Subject:Re: Are we just dead in the Water?

Message 368 of 4024
Good Morning Christine-
I hope this finds you well. Our custody plans had me seeing Adrian today until tonight at 8:30. Then you had him Sunday for ski, returning him for
an overnight on Sunday. I planned to see if Max would join at some point for MLK day to see the new place and have a family dinner. I would have all
kids back by 8:30 PM on Monday. I hope that our plan still applies. Please do let me know so I can prepare and we can do the exchange in a way that
affords you comfort and an assurance of safety.
Best Regards,
robert
Sent:01/13/2024 at 11:06 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 11:10 AM)
Subject:Kids this Weekend
Message 369 of 4024
Hi Robert,
Given the recent events, I am not going to move forward with what you outlined below or the temp plan we had worked on with Dr. Brown.
What you did to myself and boys is serious with
Immediate consequences.
Our lawyers are in communication and are negotiating next steps.
Your message below shows a complete lack of understanding of the seriousness of the situation and impact on the children and myself.
Christine
Sent:01/13/2024 at 11:16 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 11:25 AM)
Subject:Re: Kids this Weekend
Message 370 of 4024
Do you want to arrange for a Lugg pick from Kirkland place today to your residence? I will be home between now and 6pm so anytime then to assist
the lugg people. I do not want you assisting in this end.
It won’t be everything but I have a good start on items that can go over.
Big items are peloton, your bike, inversion, grill, green egg. Let me know if anything else.
I have gathered clothes, ski gear, some electronics, art, decor, miscellaneous household items in front room so it should be an easy load up.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 12:09 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 12:13 PM)
Subject:Lugg today

Message 371 of 4024
Day of is too late to arrange for a Lugg. I would be happy to bring your TV over to swap. And grab the computer stuff that I need. It is packed.
I’d really like to see Adrian today if possible. I am hoping that we do not let our personal conflicts impact them more than we have already.
Since you are out for the night it seems like a reasonable ask
Sent:01/13/2024 at 12:24 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 12:25 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg today
Message 372 of 4024
This is personal to boys and I.
Adrian was very much impacted by what you did and has expressed serious concern for his safety, legality of what happened and fear.
No on tv swap or you coming to Kirkland residence.
I am not out for the night but unavailable for coordination of Lugg. My movements are not your business.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 12:30 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 12:30 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg today
Message 373 of 4024
You told me your movement. I just responded.
I don’t know what you are telling AD or how he is involved, but I would recommend that we keep our business between us and not involve the kids.
If Adrian has any concerns they should not come through you. I am more than happy to address with him directly or with you there. As I have asked
to do for months now, but you have refused. But acting as the gatekeeper for conversations about me to the kids as you have done since July when
you told Max that you all were divorcing me does not seem appropriate or helpful.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 12:35 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 12:35 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg today
Message 374 of 4024
Adrian was the one who alerted me to the monitoring. He expressed serious concern and was very alarmed.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 12:36 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 12:37 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg today

Message 375 of 4024
I have zero idea what Adrian thinks he saw but I can assure you it was never any sort of monitoring. If there was a concern it would have been nice to
understand that and address it directly and in the moment so there was no misunderstanding. I am more than transparent and always willing to speak
to any concerns that either of you may have. That is how we should be working together in a harmonious way.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 12:41 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 12:41 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg today
Message 376 of 4024
It will all come out and unfortunately Adrian will be pulled in based on your response
I am clear on next steps.
I’ll let lawyers handle from here.My lawyer was very clear. Your proposal was unfortunate but that is how you are choosing to proceed.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 12:47 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 12:47 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg today
Message 377 of 4024
This should probably be a separate thread...
I’d like to chat with you at some point when you feel comfortable in the future. Not about this. More about how the two people in June turned into
January. It’s in no way about blame or finger pointing. It is more an acknowledgment of both our deep shared disappointment. In ourselves for
waiting so long, and each other as we try to find blame for a lost dream shared. Based on what I’ve learned, it’s an absolutely logical evolution from
deep love to the acidic hate we share now. It is a testament to how true our affection was for each other. Unfortunately, we now see that same flame
burns equally hot on both sides of hope and disappointment. It’s likely not going to solve anything, but a deeper understanding of the human
condition might ease our mind and help us make more compassionate decisions. After all, they say that the “truth will set you free.”
As I mentioned, clearly not for now. But please let me know when you might consider some reflection.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 06:37 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 06:58 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg today
Message 378 of 4024
Can you set one up for Monday. Preference is am.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 07:54 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 08:26 PM)
Subject:Monday lugg

Message 379 of 4024
I’ll be more than happy to help any way I can. Let’s collaborate on details and expectations at your convenience tomorrow.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 10:47 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 07:34 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 380 of 4024
Ok.. I have tried to get a head start on a possible next LUGG move on Monday per your request. I have included the items you noted yesterday and
replied with an update to our "Dad on the Eastside" email.
I want to be sensitive to your platform asks but feel like the email format is going to serve us better for the fine tuning so have sent a much more
legible version to your Hotmail. For your records and consistency.
I am also copying and pasting the same content here, but it will not be easy to track or understand inline comments. Frankly, it is a mess so I hope we
can use both platforms appropriately. Thanks!
------------------------Start of email------------------------------------------------
There is a lot of stuff here. I don't think it will all make it. If you can look through this list. Let me know what you think. If we agree, I can distill it
into one manageable, prioritized list to share and agree to. I appreciate the help and cooperation. Getting our homes and stuff untangled will go a long
way. Thanks!    From You:  "Big items are peloton, your bike, inversion, grill, green egg. Let me know if anything else See below. I have gathered
clothes, ski gear, some electronics, art, decor, miscellaneous household items in front room so it should be an easy load up. Sounds good. Please don't
send junk stuff though. Let's just wait till mediation and when we need to make big decisions on our final places when we need to swedish clean and
put stuff in storage...
Original "Split List" TVs : Sitting room & Deck (might ask to swap one for living room TV).OK You have the best TV we have in the living room. I'd
like to swap the one we had at the beach in the living room for the Frame that was never used in your sitting room.Furniture: I will move our sitting
room and guest room stuff to new place.I may look at Furnish to replacement items for sitting room. If Furnish items fit better in your place, you may
prefer that from a measurement perspective. OK for guest room I am using beach stuff so we don;t need to buy anything. If you would prefer it I am
open to swapping and renting but it's your call. Patio: We agree it's not used, so I will take, but we can truly divide in mediation.OK They did not
have room for the crows nest stuff. I'd like to finish that part of the move.Happy to share these if you like. The beach grill would be great for ya.You
can take all the grills. I will not use them. Does this include the green egg? If not, I can arrange for the dump. Sounds good. We can move those over.
Note there is a smoker that is under the hot tub mailbox as well.  Misc: bean bag? exercise stuff? art? pillows? desk? Is there anything in the man cave?
Can take bean bag from man cave, Pelloton, Stair Master, desk all from Man Cave. I have nice Crate and Barrel art pieces that are not hanging up that
you can take a look at and decide. You can also take the Moose in living room, cows head on porch. From this list I would say we move any pieces that
you feel like sharing, the cow's head, I can take the bean bag if you want me to but I want a black cover so may need to order? Let's sell the Peleton. I
assume Max will need the stairmaster.  Kitchen: Realistic division of shared assets, I think you are working on that.Do you want the Crate and Barrel
yellow plateware set? I pulled out the SBUX set that I bought 10 plus years ago, and have started to use that. LMK if you want the whiteporcelain set
that was on wedding registry. Its barely used. and the plateware Christmas set from your mom. Just LMK. Let's wait for medition to start divying up
more of the plateware. I am fine for now.  Decorations: We can work together in the near term and use long-term mediation.OK Love to still do this.
My place is bleak. I could really use your help as we discussed. Linens/Towels: I have a bunch from the beach, but I will want nice stuff. Suggestions?
Both households could use a refresh. Let's do this. I am happy to let you decide and just dupe. I am happy to order us the sheets that we used at the
beach that are so soft on the skin.  Other furniture for consideration
Master bedroom: I can use beach stuff as a temp option. We swap the mattresses.AgreeI think we are going to swap these at a later date. I don't want
Sent:01/14/2024 at 07:37 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/14/2024 at 07:57 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg

to wait too long. The beach mattress is rough on my back.  Dining Table: I can use the beach one as a temp. The chairs have to go, though.OK. No
actionBeach Couch/Chair: I'll keep my chair and use the couch till we get something better.I thought you were taking the sitting room set? If yes, I
will replace with something from Furnish.No action Beach Bean Bag: I'll find a place to use that somewhere, do we have an extra at home?Yes -
assumed you will take it.No action Kids bedroom set: I can use the one at the beach for AD, and use the guest for Max.OKWould like the bed and
frame for Max that is in the guest room  One kid's desk: We need two. I'll take the beach one and find a new one (1210 or Craigslist).We have the
black pottery barn one in the Man cave.No action- I would like to see if the built-in desks work first TV room sectional. You keep ours. I will rent or
buy. Hopefully, it's the only cash outlay.OK. No action. I got an Amazon fake leather one
Other Stuff from your mail and things that I can think of:All my computer stuff (it is packed)All my Amazon Packages and MailMy side table
thingsInversion machine Bikes and Bike rackBrown Back porch storage cube (next to sauna) Some extension cords, specifically the orange one that
winds up, it may be on the back porchSmall Microwave, I'd like that once your replacement is installedLadders, I don't think you will use them. If so
keep the orange oneThe Snow BlowerMy Ski Stuff

Yes coordinate on luggage. Ideally Monday am. It’s a lot of items.
If you want me you can add master bedroom set with mattress I can. I can sleep

Subject:Re: Monday lugg

I recognize that the formatting is going to be illegible, but out of respect for the desire to mainly stick to OFW for coms, I am going to copy and paste
the exact contents of an email we have shared for discussion here as well. I hope that the way we are doing this is acceptable given the situation and I
am not expecting a response here. But if you do replay here I will pay attention and reply accordingly. I am not trying to force you away from OFW in
